item.title: Century Communities Inc 10-K
item.description: Century Communities Inc, which is in the Operative Builders [1531] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 02, 2023 had 42565 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 469 instances 2022 - 416 instances december - 368 instances 31 - 361 instances financial - 350 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
